application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: T.1 Plum - Reduce to previous points, removing approx. 5m of regrowth.T.2 Ash - Reduce to previous points, removing approx. 4m of regrowth. T.3 Silver Birch -	Lateral reduction to suitable growth points providing 4m clearance from building & deadwood.T.4 English Oak - Sever ivy at base, up to 2m (exempt).	T.5	Western Red Cedar - Crown lift to 5m from ground level above road, and lift remainder of tree to 3m from ground level.G.6	Common Lime x2 - Crown Lift to 4m from ground level on client side only.
